description: Searches for system instances in the user's account.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional filter to apply to the search. Valid filters are SYSTEM_TEMPLATE_ID, STATUS, and GREENGRASS_GROUP_NAME. Multiple filters function as OR criteria in the query. Multiple values passed inside the filter function as AND criteria. (dict) --- An object that filters a system instance search. Multiple filters function as OR criteria in the search. For example a search that includes a GREENGRASS_GROUP_NAME and a STATUS filter searches for system instances in the specified Greengrass group that have the specified status. name (string) --- The name of the search filter field. value (list) --- An array of string values for the search filter field. Multiple values function as AND criteria in the search. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the search filter field.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: An array of string values for the search filter field. Multiple values function as AND criteria in the search.

nested_items.name: summaries
nested_items.description: An array of objects that contain summary data abour the system instances in the result set.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the system instance.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the system instance.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the system instance.

nested_items.name: target
nested_items.description: The target of the system instance.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupName
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system instance was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the system instance was last updated.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupVersionId
nested_items.description: The version of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to specify as nextToken when you request the next page of results.
